Posts.Content: Hi my friend just diagnosed with stage 2 breastcancer does anyone know what  these results mean from her MRI done on friday mean? Imaging 18mm lower inner quadrant left breast on muscle . Axilla normal . History grade 11 ilc no lvi. No DCIS ER8/8 PR 8/8 .Her 2 negative. P1 10% . Xx   Thankyou
